text: Control room at the MCC in Zheleznogorsk The Mining and Chemical Combine was established in 1950 to produce plutonium for weapons. It is in the closed city Zheleznogorsk, Krasnoyarsk Krai. The company is currently part of the Rosatom group. The complex has an interim storage facility. There is also a 60 t/year commercial mixed oxide (MOX) fuel fabrication facility (MFFF). The place employs 7000 people. The MOX production line completed a 10 kg batch in September 2014. ==References== == External links == * * Category:Rosatom Category:Nuclear weapons programme of Russia Category:Nuclear technology companies of Russia Category:Nuclear technology in the Soviet Union Category:Nuclear weapons program of the Soviet Union Category:Federal State Unitary Enterprises of Russia Category:Companies based in Krasnoyarsk Krai Category:Mining companies of the Soviet Union Category:1950 establishments in the Soviet Union
title: Mining and Chemical Combine
